claim_card.claim: Validation requires shared empirical substrate: open DNS cubes plus at least one real PIV dataset with time-resolved vorticity suitable for NT detection.
claim_card.test_hook: Assemble JHTDB + one PIV dataset; confirm NT detection reproducibility across them.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Use open, high-resolution DNS cubes ... and secure at least one real-world PIV dataset
